title: MedCom Terminology
introduction: The MedCom Terminology Implementation Guide covers the common terminology parts of the MedCom IGs

list.desc: *General*: Moved all terminologies to this IG. MedComHospitalNotificationEncounterClassCode: Removed the code ‘other’ from the ValueSet. MedComMessagingActivityCodes: Changed code ‘acknowledgment’ to ‘acknowledgement’ and updated description. HospitalNotificationActivityCodes: Added a Danish description of the codes. Full Changelog: https://github.com/medcomdk/dk-medcom-terminology/commits/v.2.0.0-IG
